texts.textentryhtml: Adalbert von Lanna [1836-1909, Lugt 2773]; sale of his collection, Stuttgart, May 11-22, 1909, lot 1786; Junius S. Morgan [1867-1932]; bequeathed to Princeton University Art Museum, 1932.

caption: Hendrick Goltzius (1558–1617; born Mülbracht, Netherlands; died Haarlem, Netherlands), Published by Jacob Matham (1571–1631; born and died Haarlem, Netherlands), Standing Female Personification of Sight (Visus), ca.1586. Engraving and drypoint; 22.3 x 12 cm, 22.6 x 12.2 cm (plate), 23 x 12.7 cm (sheet). Bequest of Junius S. Morgan, Class of 1888 (x1934-615)
